description: Swiss chard 'Bright Lights' is a truly amazing plant species. Not only it's nutritious - full of vitamins A, C, K, and multiple minerals - but its multi-coloured stems and leaves make it a beneficial addition to your garden. From beautiful green to striking reds, oranges, yellow, and pink, the leaves, full of flavour, add a splash of colour to your plate. Its prolific growth also allows for multiple harvests throughout the season. Additionally, Swiss chard does not require complicated maintenance; it loves sunny areas and doesn't require moisture to thrive. With Swiss chard 'Bright Lights', your garden and your plate will never be dull again.
